scripts.build: tsup src/index.ts src/middleware/index.ts src/server/index.ts src/api/index.ts --format cjs,esm --external react --external next --external @traf3li/auth-core --external @traf3li/auth-react
scripts.build:dts: tsup src/index.ts src/middleware/index.ts src/server/index.ts src/api/index.ts --format cjs,esm --dts --external react --external next --external @traf3li/auth-core --external @traf3li/auth-react
scripts.dev: tsup src/index.ts src/middleware/index.ts src/server/index.ts src/api/index.ts --format cjs,esm --external react --external next --watch
